mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM drivingrecorder WHERE NUMBER=#{0} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE drivingrecorder SET REVISION=#{1} WHERE NUMBER=#{0} LIMIT 1
UPDATE drivingrecorder SET LICENSE=#{1} WHERE NUMBER=#{0} LIMIT 1
UPDATE drivingrecorder SET INITIALMILEAGE=#{1},TOTALMILEAGE=#{2} WHERE NUMBER=#{0} LIMIT 1
UPDATE drivingrecorder SET PULSEFACTOR=#{1} WHERE NUMBER=#{0} LIMIT 1
UPDATE drivingrecorder SET VEHICLEIDCODE=#{1},PLATENUMBER=#{2},PLATETYPE=#{3} WHERE NUMBER=#{0} LIMIT 1
UPDATE drivingrecorder SET D0=#{1}, D1=#{2}, D2=#{3}, D3=#{4}, D4=#{5}, D5=#{6}, D6=#{7}, D7=#{8} WHERE NUMBER=#{0} LIMIT 1
UPDATE drivingrecorder SET CCCCODE=#{1}, MODEL=#{2}, PRODUCTIONDATE=#{3}, SERIALNUMBER=#{4} WHERE NUMBER=#{0} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert:
REPLACE INTO draccidentlog(NUMBER, TIME, LICENSENUMBER, LNG, LAT, ALT, CONTENT) VALUES
(#{item.number}, #{item.time}, #{item.license}, #{item.lng}, #{item.lat}, #{item.alt}, #{item.content})

REPLACE INTO drtimeoutlog(NUMBER, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, LICENSENUMBER, STARTLNG, STARTLAT, STARTALT,ENDLNG, ENDLAT, ENDALT) VALUES
(#{number}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{license}, #{startLat}, #{startLng}, #{startAlt}, #{endLat}, #{endLng}, #{endAlt})

REPLACE INTO drspeedlog(NUMBER, TIME, CONTENT) VALUES
(#{number}, #{time}, #{content})

REPLACE INTO drlocatelog (NUMBER, TIME, LNG, LAT, ALT, SPEED) VALUES
(#{number}, #{time}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{alt}, #{speed})
REPLACE INTO drloginlog(NUMBER, TIME, LICENSENUMBER, `EVENT`) VALUES (#{number}, #{time}, #{license}, #{event})

REPLACE INTO drspeedstatuslog(NUMBER, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, STATE, CONTENT) VALUES
(#{number}, #{start}, #{end}, #{status}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT NUMBER, REVISION, LICENSE, INITIALMILEAGE, TOTALMILEAGE, PULSEFACTOR, VEHICLEIDCODE, PLATENUMBER, PLATETYPE, CCCCODE, MODEL, PRODUCTIONDATE, SERIALNUMBER, D0, D1, D2, D3, D4, D5, D6, D7 FROM drivingrecorder WHERE NUMBER=#{0} LIMIT 1
SELECT NUMBER, TIME, LICENSENUMBER AS LICENSE, LNG, LAT, ALT, CONTENT FROM draccidentlog WHERE NUMBER=#{0} AND (TIME BETWEEN #{1} AND #{2}) ORDER BY TIME LIMIT #{3},#{4}

SELECT NUMBER, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, LICENSENUMBER AS LICENSE, STARTLNG, STARTLAT, STARTALT, ENDLNG, ENDLAT, ENDALT FROM drtimeoutlog WHERE NUMBER=#{0} AND STARTTIME >=#{1} AND ENDTIME <=#{2} ORDER BY STARTTIME LIMIT #{3},#{4}
SELECT NUMBER, TIME, `EVENT` FROM drparameterlog WHERE NUMBER=#{0} AND (TIME BETWEEN #{1} AND #{2}) ORDER BY TIME LIMIT #{3},#{4}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM drloginlog WHERE NUMBER=#{0} AND TIME BETWEEN #{1} AND #{2}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM drspeedstatuslog WHERE NUMBER=#{0} AND STARTTIME >=#{1} AND ENDTIME <=#{2}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM drspeedlog WHERE NUMBER=#{0} AND TIME BETWEEN #{1} AND #{2}
